title: Stormont Assembly recalled ahead of devolution deadline

title: Lee Anderson resigns as deputy Tory chair to rebel over Rwanda bill
description: Lee Anderson has resigned as deputy Conservative chairman to rebel over the government's flagship Rwanda bill. Another deputy party chairman, Brendan Clarke-Smith, also resigned ahead of voting against the government. They were among 60 Tory MPs who backed an amendment which rebels said was aimed at toughening up the bill.
